Rats! Rampages! Revelations! With the mystery and madcappery ratcheting up a spike-encrusted notch, Danny Ketch finally receives some of the answers he's been,2008,12
hunting. What's the true origin of the Spirit of Vengeance? What's its true history? What pointy-toothed terror is back from death to gnaw at his soul? And what the hell is he doing one mile beneath the Antarctic icecap with only a talking magpie for company? Saltares and Spurrier serve-up a history lesson that'll shake the way you see the Ghost Rider mythos forever. Vvvveeeengeaaance!
Parental Advisory ...$3.99
